bibl.title: Berenike 1997. Report of the 1997 Excavations at Berenike and the Survey of the Egyptian Eastern Desert, Including Excavations at Shenshef. (CNWS Publications. Special Series. 4.)
bibl.note: - pp. i-xxii (index), tabl., diagrammes, fac-sim., figg., cartes et 1 plan h. t.

Excavations and survey conducted by the University of Delaware and Leiden University, December 1996 - March 1997. - Pp. 201-205: The Ostraka, by R.S. BAGNALL, C.C. HELMS and A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT. A brief overview of the finds [see now: IIDEM, Documents from Berenike. I: Greek Ostraka from the 1996-1998 Seasons = Papyrologica Bruxellensia. 31 (Bruxelles, 2000)]; - 207-218: The Greek-Palmyrene Inscription, by M. DIJKSTRA and A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT. Dedication to the Palmyrene god Hierobol / Yarhibol, between 180/185 and 212 A.D.

SIDEBOTHAM Steven E. and Willemina Z. WENDRICH (Edd.), Berenike 1997. Report of the 1997 Excavations at Berenike and the Survey of the Egyptian Eastern Desert, Including Excavations at Shenshef. (CNWS Publications. Special Series. 4.)
Leiden, Research School CNWS, 1999, 8°, ix-476 pp. - pp. i-xxii (index), tabl., diagrammes, fac-sim., figg., cartes et 1 plan h. t. ISBN 90-5789-025-9. Hfl. 90.
Sidebotham Wendrich Bagnall Helms Verhoogt Dijkstra
